articles.title: US investigates Delta over plane stuck on tarmac in extreme heat - BBC
articles.description: Passengers sat on the un-air conditioned plane waiting to take off in 111F (44C) temperatures.
articles.content:
The US Department of Transportation is investigating Delta Air Lines over reports that passengers were forced to wait on an idle plane in extreme heat. 
The plane in question sat on the tarmac at th… [+1384 chars]
